overview: Screw my wife, please!!! And make it nasty! Five easy-going, porn-loving husbands watch along with the host, Dave Cummings, as their wives live out their deepest, darkest fantasies with some of today's biggest porn legends. Just wait until you see what gets these horny wives off. I think even their husbands were a bit surprised at the level of their depravity.
title: Screw My Wife, Please 20
